title: Principal Architect
details: Architected and maintained a React Native Android/iOS app written in TypeScript
Architected and maintained a fully stateless RESTful API using Serverless, NodeJS, and TypeScript, hosted on AWS API Gateway
Worked closely with the CEO to convert business rules into real executable logic
Designed custom modern UI
Integrated with several third-party APIs for things such as prescription lookup and drug pricing

title: Chief Technology Officer
details: Built the development team from a single engineer to a stable team of 10 in 4 months
Outlined and built architecture for a brand-new backend system, database, web portal, and mobile applications, as well as payment processing and order fulfillment
Pioneered the use of TypeScript, React Native, and Serverless
Worked closely with CEO to devise and develop features that would affect our business
Managed and procured relationships with 3rd party vendors
Oversaw development of 7 mobile applications, 4 web portals, and countless 3rd party integrations, used by tens of thousands of paying customers each day
Integrated a custom hardware stack to support the seamless communication with multiple proprietary Bluetooth devices
Devised process for backend and application deploys to allow consistent deploys every time.

title: VP, Architecture Development Lead
details: Led a team of 6 frontend and backend developers
Oversaw transition to WebRTC-based doctor video network; resulted in 100,000+ annual membership boost and 12 million dollar annual revenue increase
Parallelized member feed processes utilizing AWS queueing and server caching system to meet the increasing demand
Rebuilt backend API layer and purpose-built MongoDB ORM into stable, structured stack; increasing junior .NET developer productivity and onboarding
Released Ionic-based Android/iOS application; utilized by 10,000+ users daily
Architected framework for internal and external use web portals; ensured integration capability with 20+ third party networks

title: Senior AngularJS Engineer, Front End Lead
details: Converted legacy app to AngularJS, Typescript to interact with KendoUI and bootstrap
Enhanced customer lead generation system
Developed and maintained custom code generation templates; streamlined new WebAPI methods implementation by eliminating need for hand built front end service code
Devised pivotal backend and frontend patterns with sound architecture for new feature build; reduced development team administrative bloat
Built custom directives for unique business needs including non-standard scheduler, drag and drop widget manager, and claim-driven menu system

title: Senior AngularJS Engineer
details: Brought in to construct architecture and stack for all new product frontend development
Built code generation utilities for boilerplate code and web services; facilitated seamless backend service integration
Utilized custom mock server capabilities; accelerated frontend development and simplified end-to-end testability

title: Senior JavaScript Engineer, Front End Lead
details: Structured and developed JavaScript login/registration suite for utilization across all Nike products, internal and external
Met required specification of 20kd gzipped payload, pure static loading, lean server communication, localization support, form customization and millisecond response time
Worked closely with bizdev from multiple teams to assure the product we were building would work for their needs.

title: Senior Software Engineer, Team Lead
details: Architected single-page custom web application for management of multi-platform Search Engine Marketing
Created pay-per-click search advertisements via API seamlessly and produced real-time campaign adjustments based on tracked analytics
Coded frontend utilizing AngularJS; connected to lightweight ASP.net WebAPI layer to process and route calls through the business layer to MSSQL via Entity framework
Utilized then-new JavaScript MVC framework for role and security management
